name: Eric

services.title: Engineering Management
services.description: I inform technical direction and manage modern development processes at both high and granular levels

services.title: Project Management
services.description: I manage project development from end-to-end, including technical development, cross-functional communication, and community engagement

services.title: Fullstack Engineering
services.description: I build applications, typically for distributed, cloud-based systems, including front and backend services

services.title: Audio-visual Art
services.description: I create audio-visual art for creative engagement in physical spaces

aboutpara: I am a technical and creative professional with a focus in process management, ranging from highly technical to community motivated. As a skilled team builder and organizer, I place high value on the success of my individual team members and stakeholders, and I make sure that everyone has access to appropriate resources to keep a process moving forward. As a community organizer, I have reached thousands of people around the world through technology builder events. As a technical manager, I have extensive experience with delivering services to thousands of people using modern technology infrastructure, for example with distributed, virtualized, and fault-tolerant networked service architectures. I love open source! I also make art and play drums in a blues band in NOLA
